text: Myriam Nicole (born 8 February 1990) is a French downhill mountain bike racer. She is currently the 2019 DH World Champion after winning in Mont-Sainte-Anne, Quebec, Canada. She participated at the 2018 UCI Mountain Bike World Championships, winning a medal.Downhill results She is a trained physiotherapist, although she admits she doesn't see herself working in a clinic, but rather with athletes in the field.
